rule.name: AB_CreateFrmCmpntCDTForNewVersion
rule.description: This rule will create AB_FrmCmpntDesign CDT for new form version
rule.definition: with( local!optionTxt: index(ri!cdtFrmCmpnts.optionList, "optionTxt", {}), local!valueTxt: index(ri!cdtFrmCmpnts.valueList, "valueTxt", {}), local!parentCmpntIds: index(ri!cdtFrmCmpnts.parentList, "parentComponentId", {}), local!parentAnyValue: index(ri!cdtFrmCmpnts.parentList, "matchAnyValueFlag", {}), local!parentValue: index(ri!cdtFrmCmpnts.parentList, "valueTxt", {}), { Pk_Id : 0, Id : ri!cdtFrmCmpnts.Id, FrmVersionId: ri!cdtFrmCmpnts.FrmVersionId, name: ri!cdtFrmCmpnts.name, label: ri!cdtFrmCmpnts.label, description: ri!cdtFrmCmpnts.description, instruction: ri!cdtFrmCmpnts.instruction, parentCondition: ri!cdtFrmCmpnts.parentCondition, responseType: ri!cdtFrmCmpnts.responseType, defaultValue: ri!cdtFrmCmpnts.defaultValue, labelPositon: ri!cdtFrmCmpnts.labelPositon, buttonValue: ri!cdtFrmCmpnts.buttonValue, isRequired: ri!cdtFrmCmpnts.isRequired, isReadOnly: ri!cdtFrmCmpnts.isReadOnly, isInActive: ri!cdtFrmCmpnts.isInActive, isValueResetFlag: ri!cdtFrmCmpnts.isValueResetFlag , columnIndex: ri!cdtFrmCmpnts.columnIndex, seqIndex: ri!cdtFrmCmpnts.seqIndex , sectionComponentId: ri!cdtFrmCmpnts.sectionComponentId , gridComponentId: ri!cdtFrmCmpnts.gridComponentId, optionList: apply(#"_a-0000da67-9c1b-8000-6ee0-010000010000_1034"(_), local!optionTxt), valueList: apply(#"805fcf08-4e38-4eb0-ac6d-5d5b2e21f1fe"(_), local!valueTxt), parentList: apply(#"34f823e1-eba2-476f-b2b8-5e6d5f48358b"(_,_,_), merge(local!parentCmpntIds, local!parentAnyValue, local!parentValue)) } )
